data.eml:eml: Resurrection of Crypturgus subcribrosus Eggers 1933 stat. n., and its close phylogenetic relationship to Nearctic Crypturgus (Coleoptera, Scolytinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jordal, Bjarte H., Ek, Miloš Kní Ž (2007): Resurrection of Crypturgus subcribrosus Eggers 1933 stat. n., and its close phylogenetic relationship to Nearctic Crypturgus (Coleoptera, Scolytinae). Zootaxa 1606: 41-50, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.178809
